replies.author: mgzic
replies.txt_content: 你可以百度一下地图存档http://www.kuaihou.com/mc/pc/wodeshijiecundang/你可以进去自己看看。

replies.author: mgzic
replies.txt_content: 我发错了，没看到你是要主城地图http://www.kuaihou.com/s/wodeshijiezhuchengditu/这里吧，刚那个范围太大

replies.author: Me_Ason
replies.txt_content: http://mc.ahgame.com/map/20150304105657.shtml 这个主城不错 我用的就是 下载链接在最后一张图片下面
